channel.title: [525]Need some item pricing help[525]
channel.description:
Hi there, I recently started a RSPS, and I need to code it up so that when you spawn an item (::item 4151 1) It will cost (for example this is a whip) 1.68M, and when you sell it, it will sell for 1.4M.
I also have a lot of items to code up for pricing, but I just need to know HOW to price them like that.
Also, I would like to make some items unavailible to Regular players and player moderators, but availible to Admins. Items like Partyhats and other rares will be unspawnable.
I also would like to know how to code Magic spells so that they can only be used if your a certain magic level, and if you have the required runes.
If anyone can help me out with this, I'd really appriciate it.
Thanks.

item.title: [525]Need some item pricing help[525]
